# selectedRange

**Instance Property**

The current selection range of the text view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedRange: NSRange { get set }
```

## Discussion

In iOS 2.2 and earlier, the length of the selection range is always 0, indicating that the selection is actually an insertion point. In iOS 3.0 and later, the length of the selection range may be non-zero.

## Working with the selection

- **scrollRangeToVisible(_:)**: Scrolls the text view until the text in the specified range is visible.
- **clearsOnInsertion**: A Boolean value that indicates whether inserting text replaces the previous contents.
- **isSelectable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text view is selectable.
